select P.* from product P where product_no = #{ productNo }
select * from product_main_images where product_no = #{ productNo }
select * from address where member_id = #{memberId} order by reg_date desc
mapper.insert: insert into review values( seq_review_no.nextval, #{ purchaseLogNo }, #{ comments }, #{ score }, default )
mapper.delete: delete from cart where member_id = #{memberId} and product_no = #{productNo}

update purchase_log set status = 1 where purchase_log_no = #{purchaseLogNo}

insert into return_images values( seq_return_image_no.nextval, #{ originalFilename }, #{ renamedFilename }, #{ returnNo } )

mapper.select: select R.return_no return_no, R.status status, R.purchase_log_no purchase_log_no, R.amount amount, R.confirm confirm, PL.product_no product_no, (select product_name from product where product_no = PL.product_no) product_name, (select member_id from purchase where purchase_no = PL.purchase_no) member_id from return R join purchase_log PL on (R.purchase_log_no = PL.purchase_log_no) where confirm = 0 order by return_no
